ygData.subject: Re: Anyone wanna play with me?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Guys, I just sat and ready through every single post....ack! I was late for work =)  I play on the Veeshan server I have a 47 erudite shadowknight
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Guys, I just sat and ready through every
single post....ack! I was late for work =) <br> <br>I
play on the Veeshan server I have a 47 erudite
shadowknight named Buddyheartless...a 23 dark elf enchanter
named Buddrasia Nytekiss....a 21 Barbarian Rogue named
Feenck Ployd...and others...apparently not many people
who post here use Veeshan but if you happen to and
need some advice or someone to adventure with give me
a /tell =)<br><br>ugh these withdrawals are killing
me...back to EverCrack
